2.content: The event loop, this, closures, and prototypal inheritance are special about JavaScript.

5.content: In JavaScript, the value of `this` is determined when a function is called; not when it is defined.

6.content: A closure is formed when a function retains access to variables in its lexical scope.

12.content: I want to have goblins about me, for I am courageous. The courage which scares away ghosts, creats for itself goblins - it wants to laugh.

13.content: you must have chaos within you to give birth to a dancing star

14.content: and when i saw my devil, I found him serious, thorough, profound, solemn: he was the spirit of gravity - through him all things fall. Not by wrath, but by laughter, do we slay. Come, let us slay the spirit of gravity!

15.content: I learned to walk; since then have I let myself run. I learned to fly; since then I do not need pushing in order to move. Now I am light, now I fly; now I see myself under myself. Now there dances a God in me.

16.content: every deep thinker is more afraid of being understood than of being misunderstood.
